referralsScreen.whoHaveToGo: Who have I got to go to?
referralsScreen.whoHaveToGoDescription: If you have an acquaintance / friend and you are sure that he will become a great player of the Innowise Group team - call him to us! We will be happy to chat and arrange interviews.

rules.rule_1: Employees are eligible for a bonus for a candidate of any level
rules.rule_2: If several people act as a referral for the same candidate, the referral will be the one who first introduced the candidate.
rules.rule_3: Possibility to recommend to any location
rules.rule_4: The bonus is paid to the salary after the candidate has passed the probationary period

contacts.contactsDescription: Write a letter with the contacts of the candidate to the recruiter in your city
